choice.name: Calendar
choice.tooltip: Show progress of a year, month,...

choice.name: Custom
choice.tooltip: Use user-defined start and end time

entry.name: dayStartsAt
entry.label: This time is cut off from the start of the day

entry.name: dayEndsAt
entry.label: This time is cut off from the end of the day By default, this is just the length of one day.

entry.name: weekStartsAt
entry.label: This time is cut off from the start of the week

entry.name: weekEndsAt
entry.label: The period after which the week ends (from the start of the week). By default, this is just the length of one week minus one day (since the day offset is also applied to weeks).

entry.name: weekStartsOnMonday
entry.label: Whether the week starts on monday (vs sunday)

entry.name: customTimeStart
entry.label: The start of the user-defined interval

entry.name: customTimeEnd
entry.label: The end of the user-defined interval

entry.name: showRemainingTime
entry.label: Show the remaining rather than the passed time

entry.name: rotation
entry.label: The rotation of the plasmoid in degrees

entry.name: showBar
entry.label: Whether to show the bar itself

entry.name: showText
entry.label: Whether to show text on the bar

entry.name: fontFamily
entry.label: Font family. e.g "arial". The system font is used if this is not set.
